request.description: The provided item should be an object like the example provided. This objects was obtained from the tldraw library using "getSnapshot(store)" function over the store of the editor, which returns a TLEditorSnapshot object. Other objects will be stored, but the store will not load if the format is not correct.
Be aware this action is destructive and will delete the record from the DB instead of setting a deletedAt to a Date. This is only available from the API and is not used on the App.
